channel.title: [317] Spellbook Teleport Help [Delta]
channel.description:
On the spellbooks I want to change the interface that pops up, the name of the spell(and stuff on interface), and of course the actual coordinates of the spells. Heres an example.
this is the interface I do not want. I want to remove this interface, change all the names, etc.
http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/684/lolsqt.png/
Here is the interface I actually want.
http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/94/23633320.png/
I know it has something to do with clicking most, but I don't know the case number for all the spells, nor do I know how to change the interface layout

item.title: [317] Spellbook Teleport Help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Check the button clicked when you open the interface
then search that button in your clickingmost class
you’ll see the interface id executed, replace it by the one you want,

it’s a sidebarinterface,

search for this in your client class:

setSidebarInterface

you should see something like this:

setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); // attack tab
				setSidebarInterface(1, 3917); // skills tab
				//setSidebarInterface(2, 638); // quest tab with scrolling
				setSidebarInterface(2, 639); //quest tab without scrolling
				setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); // backpack tab
				setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); // items wearing tab
				setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); // pray tab
					if (playerAncientMagics == 0) {
						 setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
						 playerAncientMagics = 0;
					}
					if (playerAncientMagics == 1) {
						setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
						 playerAncientMagics = 1;
					}

Like you see, there are the interfaces located, replace the one that is there now in your magic tab, by the right one (in the code)

Read full topic
